attributes.action: Ban the Anti-Islamic Film "Innocence of Muslims"
attributes.additional_details:
The Movie "Innocence of Muslims" is derogatory, offensive and disparaging to our Beloved Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon Him) and is a direct attack to those who have faith in Islam. This film is provocative and may cause more damage.

US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton stated, "Let me state very clearly and I hope it is obvious that the United States government had nothing to do with this video," She further stated "We absolutely reject its content and message. America's commitment to religious tolerance goes back to the very beginning of our nation.""To us, to me personally, this video is disgusting and repressible,"

This Movie must be banned on all websites and all those websites be blocked with immediate effect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the British Board of Film Certification (BBFC).
